mapper.insert: insert into onboarding_instances (onboarding_id, company_id, employee_id, onboarding_template_id, status, start_date, completed_at, created_by, created_at, updated_at) values (#{onboardingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onboardingTemplateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{completedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update onboarding_instances set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, onboarding_template_id = #{onboardingTemplateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, completed_at = #{completedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where onboarding_id = #{onboardingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select onboarding_id, company_id, employee_id, onboarding_template_id, status, start_date, completed_at, created_by, created_at, updated_at from onboarding_instances where onboarding_id = #{onboardingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select onboarding_id, company_id, employee_id, onboarding_template_id, status, start_date, completed_at, created_by, created_at, updated_at from onboarding_instances
